alert.note: Alert for Appling; Bacon; Brantley; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 16 at 2:26PM EST until December 17 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Georgia, including the following areas, Appling, Bacon, Brantley, Coffee, Jeff Davis, Northern Ware, Pierce and Wayne. * WHEN...From 7 PM EST this evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A Gulf Low will bring widespread 3 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Bacon; Brantley; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
